definitions: (of two teams or competitors) play an extra game or match to decide a draw or tie

examples.text: the runners-up will play off against each other

shortDefinitions: play extra match to decide draw or tie

definitions: bring two people into conflict or competition for one's own advantage

examples.text: detectives employ more than one informant so as to play one off against the other

shortDefinitions: bring people into conflict or competition for one's own advantage
